ygData.subject: Mana song question
ygData.msgSnippet: But in this case there were two bards in the party. I was only 30th level so I played hymn all the time after combat.  32+ bard played mana song all the time
ygData.messageBody:
But in this case there were two bards in the party. I was only 30th level so
I played hymn all the time after combat. 32+ bard played mana song all the
time after combat. If lute doesn't increase mana regen with 32d song, there
wasn't any reason for the 32+ bard to equip it except for esoteric reasons.

Galtin of E'ci
32 bard

> > Prior to 32d level, whenever I grouped with a 32+ bard they usually had
> a
> > lute equipped when playing the mana song after combat.
>
> I almost always intersperse one pulse of hymn for every two of clarity,
> and have never received complaint about the mana coming more slowly for
> doing so.
>
>
